pages.text: The cauldron is one the most basic machines for a witch to use, it allows you to create brews among other items by dropping items into it. If you have placed a valid recipe into it, the liquid will change color. You can empty the cauldron by shift right clicking it with an empty hand.

pages.title: Anointing Paste
pages.text: Anointing paste is a mash of different seeds that hold varying amounts of magical energy that when smeared upon a cauldron infuse it with magical power, turning it into the witch's cauldron.
